effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 15%
name: True Hydaelyn Guard

真・海德林的加護
진·하이델린의 가호

desc_short: Boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 15%
提高15%全屬性耐性的數值
불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 15% 상승
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 15%, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 15%
desc_long: Boosts fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 15%.
提高15%全屬性耐性的數值。
불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 15% 상승합니다.
Augmente la résistance à feu / glace / foudre / eau / vent / terre / lumière / ténèbres de 15%.
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 15%, alle Verb.
Aumenta la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 15%.
